name: Gengar LV.X
author: Shizurow

poke_power.name: Level-Down
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may choose 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon LV.X. Remove the Level-Up card from that Pokémon and have your opponent shuffle that card into his or her deck. This power can’t be used if Gengar is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Compound Pain
attacks.effect: This attack does 30 damage to each of your opponent’s Pokémon that already has any damage counters on it. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

rule_box: Put this card onto your Active Gengar. Gengar LV.X can use any attack, Poké-Power, or Poké-Body from its previous level.
